highlights: Assisted in teaching Introduction to Algorithms and Mathematics: graded assignments, provided feedback, and addressed queries, including broad range of algorithms, and derivations, for diverse cohort of 60+ students.
Developed Java-based GUI to display details of RC Plane to Judges in SAE international, Texas.
Engineered Arduino code for real-time location tracking of the RC plane.
Designed and implemented functionality to open the gate of the RC plane upon button press, enhancing operational capabilities and user control, to drop the payload.

publications.name: Machine learning-based: Selection of optimal cricket team based on the players‚Äô performance
publications.summary: Designed an application to automate cricket team selection, to reduce human errors and selection bias.

certificates.name: The Complete React Developer Course (w/ Hooks and Redux)

projects.name: Selection of optimal team
projects.description: An app that removes human errors and bias.
highlights: Designed a web app to automate cricket team selection, attaining 73% overall accuracy rate.
Implemented Jest unit tests (97% coverage) for web app functionality, ensuring accurate cricket team selection.

projects.name: Stock Market Notifications
projects.description: Broker system overseeing key distributed algorithms and a modular client-server architecture
highlights: Crafted and implemented a robust broker system adept in overseeing vital distributed algorithms such as Broadcast, Leader Election, Consistency, Heartbeat Protocol, and Mutual Exclusion.
Employed ReactJs and Spring Boot to construct a modular client-server framework, augmenting maintainability.

projects.name: NLP Text Summarization Application
projects.description: Text summarization app providing efficient condensation of textual content into summaries
highlights: Engineered NLP-based text summarization app proficient in condensing lengthy textual content into summaries.
Implemented deep learning techniques using TensorFlow for natural language processing, including tokenization, sequence-to-sequence modeling, and attention mechanisms.
Utilized AWS cloud services such as Lambda for serverless computing, S3 for data storage, and EC2 for hosting the application, ensuring scalability, reliability, and cost-effectiveness.

projects.name: Real-Time Video Conferencing Platform
highlights: Devised real-time WebRTC-based video conferencing utilizing React Router and Redux.
Created scalable WebSocket server using Redis, boosting real-time chat and meeting collaboration.

projects.name: Face Recognition App
highlights: Investigated face detection via Haar cascades and HOG, feature extraction using PCA, LBP, and LDA, classification employing SVM, k-NN, and ensemble methods, achieving up to 83% accuracy.
Explored deep learning integration utilizing CNN-based convolutional feature extraction, facial embedding with networks like FaceNet, and similarity-based classification.
Delved into model training intricacies emphasizing cross-validation, hyperparameter optimization with GridSearchCV to refine accuracy and robustness.

projects.name: Dynamic Bookstore Management System
highlights: Created a dynamic book catalogue with advanced search functionality, to browse, search, customized cart.
Containerized the application using Docker, and deployed leveraging Amazon EC2.

projects.name: Automated Item Recognition
highlights: Created an app that automatically recognizes items and adds them to lists, ready to be used for a wide range of tasks.
